frontMatter.title: Apache Airflow 2.0: A Practical Jump Start
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this article, I would like to give you a jump-start to understand the basic concepts and create a workflow pipeline from scratch.

prev.title: Spring Boot: API First Design
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: Here we take a practical approach to API first design with an example using Open API 3 specification

next.title: Kind - A New Kubernetes Cluster
next.author: Amrut Prabhu
next.summary: Here we explore how to create a kubernetes cluster on your local machine
